title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.16 - Spread of hours
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.16 - Spread of hours

State Regulations

The
spread of hours
is the interval
between the beginning and end of an employee's workday. The spread of hours for
any day includes working time plus time off for meals plus intervals of
duty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-3.16

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
